timeline.bodyText: This sounds like the time with jitter.  We may need to maintain a lastEndTime.  So every time we get a signal from scheduler, we do [lastEndTime, lastEndTime+interval] and update lastEndTime.  Of course, we need to deal with the case when scheduler misses sending us signals.
